attributes.action: Save our local British Legion, in Barrowby, Grantham,the oldest in the country.
attributes.additional_details: Barrowby British Legion (Grantham) is in danger of being closed because they have had their entertainment licence taken away because ONE person complained about noise.Considering that none of us would have the freedom that we have, if it wasn't for the bravery of so many people it is vital that we save Barrowby British Legion in Grantham ! The Legion doesn't just help ex-servicemen and women it also helps to look after their families, even after they are gone! Please sign this petition and we can help to make sure that this institute of our community continues with its good work!!

rejection.details: The Licensing Act 2003 devolved responsibility for the administration and enforcement of the licensing regime to individual licensing authorities, based in city, district and borough councils.  We would suggest therefore that you contact your local licensing officer for an answer to your query.
